channel.title: Starter
channel.description: so i added my own starter and i was wondering how would i make it so when you first login you carnt click the mini map or any where els untill you have picked your starter

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:2, topic:477996”][quote author=TheTutMan link=topic=596194.msg4197635#msg4197635 date=1357755522]
so i added my own starter and i was wondering how would i make it so when you first login you carnt click the mini map or any where els untill you have picked your starter
[/quote]
Create a variable that returns false unless you have selected your starter, then take a look at your walking packet.[/quote]
this, also you can have a look on how they did on barrows if you cant figure out how to do it

Read full topic

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

TheTutMan:

so i added my own starter and i was wondering how would i make it so when you first login you carnt click the mini map or any where els untill you have picked your starter

Create a variable that returns false unless you have selected your starter, then take a look at your walking packet.

Read full topic
